oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Au nanocrystal flash memory reliability and failure analysis
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SINGH, PK
SINGH, KK
HOFMANN, R
ARMSTRONG, K
KRISHNA, N
MAHAPATRA, S
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: fabrication
performance
oxide
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this work we investigate the memory performance and reliability of An nanocrystal memory devices. We analyze the Au NC formation process and fabricate actual test wafers for electrical characterization. With reference to good Pt NC devices, poor performance of Au NC devices is investigated in detail by analytical and electrical methods.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: IPFA 2008: PROCEEDINGS OF THE 15TH INTERNATIONAL SYMPOSIUM ON THE PHYSICAL & FAILURE ANALYSIS OF INTEGRATED CIRCUITS,214-218
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: 15th International Symposium on the Physical and Failure Analysis of Integrated Circuits,Singapore, SINGAPORE,JUL 07-11, 2008
